aboutPage.ediDescription: We are a team of experienced graphic designers and developers whose goal is to deliver high quality products to our customers.  Unlike other shops, we have been in the technology business since 1998, and have the web transform from static sites, to fully responsive web applications powered by JavaScript frameworks.  Our belief is that through a great company culture, and phenomenal engineering practices we can great wonderful produts that we are proud of and that our customers love.

adminPage.description: Welcome to the Administration section of EDI, feel free to add blogs, adjust details and see usage statistics.
adminPage.title: Administration

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.mainDescription: We love hearing from you whether you're just curious or an existing customer.  Our relationship with our clients is the most important part of our business.
contactPage.actionTitle: Say hi by clicking an option below!
contactPage.salesDescription: Come talk to our lovely sales department, we would be happy to talk about your next project and give a quote.
contactPage.supportDescription: Uh oh! Something not quite right?? Click here to alert the team so we can get your issue resolved right away!

footer.aboutUsDescription: Exceleration Designs, is a group of highly experienced technologists who have been in the web design industry since 1998.  Our focus is to craft high quality product and maintain exceptional customer service.

homePage.consultingDescription: Our experience with a mix of state-of-the-art and legacy software will help any business reach their goals.
homePage.customSoftwareDescription: Over 30 years of experience designing commerical grade software for a multitude of applications.

ourServices.customerServiceDescription: We pride ourselves on taking care of you the customer. Update the website? Done in 24 hours. Add new features? Done after quick consult. Need to talk? You can reach us, not a call center.
ourServices.cuttingEdgeDescription: We thrive on learning and using the best tool for the job.  This often means we use a range of tools to solve your business need in the correct manner.
ourServices.description: Since 1998, our team has been in the business of finding and building the correct technological solution for our customers.  These services range from custom websites, application design and consulting.
ourServices.designDescription: Our designers have been building robust, modern and classic designs to fit our customer needs.
ourServices.heading: We craft technology in beautiful applications.
ourServices.legacySupportDescription: Technology moves fast.  We keep our thumb on the latest and greatest while still supporting the classic legacy tools of our industry.
ourServices.title: Our Services.

homePage.title: Home
homePage.weBuildTechDescription: Since 1998, Exceleration Designs has been designing, building, and crafting a better experience for the internet.
homePage.websiteDesignDescription: We craft stunning websites, that are fully responsive, SEO friendly and have a modern design.
homePage.welcomeDescription: We are a team of highly trained technologists, able to solve your problem.

loginPage.description: Login, and this will allow you to create blogs, adjust the address and misc details of EDI.
loginPage.title: Login
